explanation: Finale, Epilogue, Coda, and Denouement all refer to the concluding or final part of a performance, book, musical piece, or narrative. Prologue, however, refers to an introductory section.

category: Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
explanation: The Pyramids of Giza, Hanging Gardens of Babylon, Lighthouse of Alexandria, and Colossus of Rhodes are all traditionally listed among the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. The Great Wall of China is a monumental ancient structure, but it is not part of that original list.
All tokens except 'Motor' are palindromes, meaning they read the same forwards and backwards.
